issue.title: [C++] Equals / ApproxEquals behaviour undefined on FP NaNs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4952](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4952). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On floating-point NaN values, the behaviour of Array::Equals and Array::ApproxEquals is currently undefined. It should probably default to something useful (and possibly be overridable using a bool parameter).
